result.reason: Current implementation has a global limit of 200. Promoting this to a per-connection (inheritable) setting offers better granularity and fully addresses the need for limits >20 on specific unstable connections.
result.approach: Add inheritable 'MaxReconnectAttempts' property to ConnectionInfo, defaulting to the global setting. Update RdpProtocol to use the connection-specific value and handle attempts >20 via the existing extension logic.
